bibl.title: Army and Police in Roman Upper Egypt.
bibl.note: A shorter version of this paper was given at the International Papyrological Symposium in Urbana, and the fuller version was delivered to a session of the Columbia University Seminar in Classical Civilization in April, 1976.
bibl.seg: Bagnall Roger S., Army and Police in Roman Upper Egypt.

A shorter version of this paper was given at the International Papyrological Symposium in Urbana, and the fuller version was delivered to a session of the Columbia University Seminar in Classical Civilization in April, 1976.
